definition: aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: That they get bored with childhood, they rush to grow up.
sentences.chinese: 他們覺得童年很無聊，急著讓自己長大。

definition: to worry/to feel anxious/Taiwan pr. [zhao1 ji2]
there's not enough time (to do sth)/it's too late (to do sth)
there's still time/able to do sth in time
as for/as to/to go so far as to
to give thought (to others)/to consider (other people's needs)/also pr. [zhao2 xiang3]
to use as an excuse/on the pretext/excuse/pretext/also written 借口[jie4 kou3]
to throw down/to dump/to abandon/thrown down
to consider past cause and future effect (idiom); to think over the past and future/to ponder over reasons and connection
